languages.text:
When the wearer attacks with a heavy weapon, they deal +30% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is reduced by −50%.
This effect is inactive, while the wearer is under the {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}confident approach{/g} effect.
languages.original_text:
The wearer's heavy weapon attacks gain +30% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} but their critical hit chance is lowered by -50%.
This effect is disabled while the wearer is under {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}Confident Approach{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
When the wearer attacks with a heavy weapon, they deal +30% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is reduced by −50%.
This effect is inactive, while the wearer is under the {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}confident approach{/g} effect.

When the wearer attacks with a heavy weapon, they deal +30% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is reduced by −50%.
This effect is inactive, while the wearer is under the {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}confident approach{/g} effect.
The wearer's heavy weapon attacks gain +50% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} but never critically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}.

When the wearer attacks with a heavy weapon, they deal +30% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is reduced by −50%.
This effect is inactive, while the wearer is under the {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}confident approach{/g} effect.

languages.text:
当装备者使用重型武器进行攻击时，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高30%，但{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}降低50%。
当装备者拥有{g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}激流勇进{/g}效果时，此效果无效。
languages.original_text:
When the wearer attacks with a heavy weapon, they deal +30% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is reduced by −50%.
This effect is inactive, while the wearer is under the {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}confident approach{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
当装备者使用重型武器进行攻击时，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高30%，但{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}降低50%。
当装备者拥有{g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}激流勇进{/g}效果时，此效果无效。

languages.text:
Атаки тяжелым оружием наносят +30% дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, но {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шанс критического попадания{/g} становится ниже на 50%.
Этот эффект не действует, пока персонаж использует {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}решительный подход{/g}.
languages.original_text:
When the wearer attacks with a heavy weapon, they deal +30% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is reduced by −50%.
This effect is inactive, while the wearer is under the {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}confident approach{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Атаки тяжелым оружием наносят +30% дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, но {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шанс критического попадания{/g} становится ниже на −50%.
Этот эффект не действует, пока на персонажа действует эффект {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}решительный подход{/g}.
Атаки тяжелым оружием наносят на 50% больше урона, при этом критических попаданий не происходит.

Атаки тяжелым оружием наносят +30% дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, но {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шанс критического попадания{/g} становится ниже на −50%.
Этот эффект не действует, пока на персонажа действует эффект {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}решительный подход{/g}.

Атаки тяжелым оружием наносят +30% дополнительного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, но {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шанс критического попадания{/g} становится ниже на 50%.
Этот эффект не действует, пока персонаж использует {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}решительный подход{/g}.

languages.text:
使用者が銃火器で攻撃すると、追加で+30%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるが、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル率{/g}が−50%低下する。
この効果は、使用者が{g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}警戒接近{/g}の効果を受けている間は無効となる。
languages.original_text:
When the wearer attacks with a heavy weapon, they deal +30% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is reduced by −50%.
This effect is inactive, while the wearer is under the {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}confident approach{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が銃火器で攻撃すると、追加で+30%の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるが、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル率{/g}が−50%低下する。
この効果は、使用者が{g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}警戒接近{/g}の効果を受けている間は無効となる。

languages.text:
Si el portador ataca con un arma pesada, inflige un +30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional, pero su {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} se reduce en un −50 %.
Este efecto se invalida mientras el portador esté bajo los efectos del {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}Enfoque confiado{/g}.
languages.original_text:
When the wearer attacks with a heavy weapon, they deal +30% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is reduced by −50%.
This effect is inactive, while the wearer is under the {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}confident approach{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Si el portador ataca con un arma pesada, inflige un +30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional, pero su {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} se reduce en un −50 %.
Este efecto se invalida mientras el portador esté bajo los efectos del {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}Enfoque confiado{/g}.

languages.text:
Greift der Träger mit einer schweren Waffe an, verursacht er +30 % zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, aber seine {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Kritische Trefferchance{/g} wird um −50 % reduziert.
Dieser Effekt ist inaktiv, solange der Träger mit dem Effekt {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}Selbstbewusstes Vorgehen{/g} belegt ist.
languages.original_text:
When the wearer attacks with a heavy weapon, they deal +30% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is reduced by −50%.
This effect is inactive, while the wearer is under the {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}confident approach{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text:
Greift der Träger mit einer schweren Waffe an, verursacht er +30 % zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, aber seine {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Kritische Trefferchance{/g} wird um −50 % reduziert.
Dieser Effekt ist inaktiv, solange der Träger mit dem Effekt {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}Selbstbewusstes Vorgehen{/g} belegt ist.

languages.text:
Lorsque le porteur attaque avec une arme lourde, il inflige + 30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires, mais sa {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chance de coup critique{/g} est réduite de −50 %.
Cet effet reste inactif tant que le porteur est sous l'effet d'{g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}Approche confiante{/g}.
languages.original_text:
When the wearer attacks with a heavy weapon, they deal +30% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is reduced by −50%.
This effect is inactive, while the wearer is under the {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}confident approach{/g} effect.

traits.locale_text: Les attaques à l'arme lourde de l'utilisateur bénéficient de +50 % de dégâts supplémentaires mais n'infligent jamais de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique.

Lorsque le porteur attaque avec une arme lourde, il inflige + 30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires, mais sa {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chance de coup critique{/g} est réduite de −50 %.
Cet effet reste inactif tant que le porteur est sous l'effet d'{g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}Approche confiante{/g}.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, ağır silahla saldırdığında +%30 ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir ancak {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g} %50 azalır.
Bu etki, takan kişi {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}öz güvenli yaklaşım{/g} etkisi altındayken tesir etmez.
